label: NegotiationExchange
comment: An offer exchanged between parties for an electronic negotiation.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the type of the protocol for this electronic negotiation exchange, such as Alternating Offer Protocol, Continuous Offer Protocol, Withdrawable Alternating Offer Protocol, Withdrawable Continuous Offer Protocol.
The date or date time value when the response is due for this electronic negotiation exchange.
The identifier of the session for this electronic negotiation exchange.
A context specified for this electronic negotiation exchange.
A targeted topic for debate or resolution.
